nodes.text: The Sub-ter rover was a wheeled vehicle used by the Imperial troops station at Spindrift.
The sub-ter rover had six large wheels for propulsion and two small frontal wheels for steering. The vehicle had enough room for at least two people.

The sub-ter rover was used by Spindrift Station personnel in an attempt to escape the destruction of their station by Rebel forces.
Their goal was getting underground by crossing a bridge, but the Rebel fighters blew it up and forced the troops to surrender.
